fplR
  • Reference
  • Articles

Summary player data for the current FPL season

Gives a tibble containing summary data for all players in the current FPL season.

players()

Examples

players()
#> # A tibble: 683 x 47
#>       id   code      first_name second_name    web_name team_name   position
#>    <int>  <int>           <chr>       <chr>       <chr>     <chr>      <chr>
#>  1     1  48844           David      Ospina      Ospina   Arsenal Goalkeeper
#>  2     2  11334            Petr        Cech        Cech   Arsenal Goalkeeper
#>  3     3  51507         Laurent   Koscielny   Koscielny   Arsenal   Defender
#>  4     4  17127             Per Mertesacker Mertesacker   Arsenal   Defender
#>  5     5 158074 Gabriel Armando    de Abreu     Gabriel   Arsenal   Defender
#>  6     6  98745          Héctor    Bellerín    Bellerín   Arsenal   Defender
#>  7     7  42427          Kieran       Gibbs       Gibbs   Arsenal   Defender
#>  8     8  27334         Mathieu     Debuchy     Debuchy   Arsenal   Defender
#>  9     9  80254            Carl   Jenkinson   Jenkinson   Arsenal   Defender
#> 10    10  38411           Nacho     Monreal     Monreal   Arsenal   Defender
#> # ... with 673 more rows, and 40 more variables: status <fctr>, news <chr>,
#> #   price <dbl>, price_change_abs <dbl>, price_change_round <dbl>,
#> #   chance_of_playing_this_round <int>, chance_of_playing_next_round <int>,
#> #   value_form <dbl>, value_season <dbl>, in_dreamteam <lgl>,
#> #   dreamteam_count <int>, selected_by_percent <dbl>, form <dbl>,
#> #   transfers_out <int>, transfers_in <int>, transfers_out_round <int>,
#> #   transfers_in_round <int>, total_points <int>, round_points <int>,
#> #   points_per_game <dbl>, ep_this <dbl>, ep_next <dbl>, minutes <int>,
#> #   goals_scored <int>, assists <int>, clean_sheets <int>,
#> #   goals_conceded <int>, own_goals <int>, penalties_saved <int>,
#> #   penalties_missed <int>, yellow_cards <int>, red_cards <int>, saves <int>,
#> #   bonus <int>, bps <int>, influence <dbl>, creativity <dbl>, threat <dbl>,
#> #   ict_index <dbl>, ea_index <int>
